fr.hes.raynaudmonitoring

Class MainFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • fr.hes.raynaudmonitoring.MainFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class MainFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    A simple Fragment subclass. Activities that contain link to AddTreatmentActivityand AddCrisisActivity Centralize the data of the users Use the newInstance() factory method to create an instance of this fragment.
